abstract: Examining the rationales for supporting or damning the practice of borrowing against a retirement fund can be a useful exercise.
snippet: Examining the rationales for supporting or damning the practice of borrowing against a retirement fund can be a useful exercise.
lead_paragraph: This year, word got out about a Visa debit card aimed at people who wanted to borrow money from their 401(k) accounts. With plastic in hand, they could withdraw the funds from an A.T.M. or spend them at any merchant that accepted Visa, just as they could with a regular bank debit card.

headline.main: When Credit Gets Tight, a 401(k) Loan Becomes Tempting
headline.print_headline: When Credit Gets Tight, a 401(k) Loan Becomes Tempting
